{{Wireless embedded system |brand=T-Com |model=Speedport W500V |series=G125 |asin=B0011U7WXQ;DE; |is_manuf=No |manuf=Tecom |est_release_date=12/2006 |fcc_date=04/03/2006 |fcc_id=D6XAW4038 |pcb_id=613A200088 |type=wireless router,dsl modem,analog phone gateway |pwr_v=16 |pwr_amp=0.9 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6348 |cpu1_cspeed=256 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320ATTC-70G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V641620ETP-H |ram1_num=2 |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=ADSL2+, VoIP |stock_boot=CFE;1.0.37; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.8.1; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |oui=00:03:C9,00:16:38 |oui_eth=00:03:C9,00:16:38 }} {{TagLine|Broadband DSL Modem Router}} :[http://www.telekom.de/dlp/eki/downloads/Speedport/Speedport_W500V/bedanl_speedport_w500v_11.2005.pdf Manual]
aka ''Speedport W 500V'', ''Targa WR 500 VoIP''
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/t-com/spw500v On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([http://wiki.openwrt.org/inbox/speedport.w500v and again] OEM ''TECOM'') :"613A200088_A (SPW500V)" is silkscreened on the main board.
{{see also|DQ Technology VisionNet TW207er-4}}
*[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k9NUtTovyaM YouTube video showing the device]
